localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: All you got to do is check/uncheck to filter tweets from verified tweeple only! Works in the home feed, search results, tweet replies, and anywhere else tweets show up!
nodes.title: Verified Tweets Only - Simple browser extension to filter only verified tweets
nodes.author: Rajat Vaghani

nodes.excerpt: Hide My Web is an chrome extension which will help you to hide, blur and highlight any webpage element with a single click of mouse. You can also hide your webpage title with Hide My Web. Visit our website to know more about Hide My Web.
nodes.title: Hide My Web - Hide, blur and highlight elements of any webpage.
nodes.author: Divyanshu Gour

nodes.excerpt: Page Pad is a Chrome extension for creating notes on any web page while browsing the web. Now create, edit and maintain notes for any web page you visit or easily access all notes on a particular website.
nodes.title: Page Pad - Chrome extension for making notes on any web page
nodes.author: kushagra gour

nodes.excerpt: Profilehunt is a Kanban board built for organizing your job search. It comes with a browser extension so you can add jobs from any website to your board. Profilehunt sends weekly reminders and updates on applications.
nodes.title: Profilehunt - A Kanban board that helps you organize your job search
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Spend time building your Chrome Extension, not setting up manifests and environments. Chrome Extension Kit includes 17 different battle-tested starter templates so you can avoid the tedious stuff and focus on shipping faster than ever.
nodes.title: Chrome Extension Kit 2.0 - Launch your next Chrome Extension project faster than ever
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Find the right hashtag tailored for your Instagram profile. Analyse the competition & get the related hashtags. With GrowMeOrganic Hashtag Hunter, you can find the hashtag that can help to rank you on the top post of a hashtag page on Instagram
nodes.title: Instagram Hashtag Hunter - Instagram hashtag research tool
nodes.author: Anant Gupta

nodes.excerpt: If you do screen share or record tutorials securing sensitive information can be to much time consuming or impossible when doing live, Use blurweb app to hide sensitive info in few clicks
nodes.title: Blurweb App - Secure sensitive info while screen share recording or live
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Show Keys is a utility to show key presses on your Browser. And that's it. It just does that one thing.
nodes.title: Show Keys - See your key presses in your browser while you type
nodes.author: Shuvam Manna

nodes.excerpt: Chrome ext to autocomplete your sentences in any text box. AI powered sentence completion that works in any text area on any web page.
nodes.title: AutoComplete - Type faster, let AI finish your sentences
nodes.author: Soheil

nodes.excerpt: https://world.hey.com/nasir/cookie-popups-have-ruined-the-web-fdaee6fe and madee the user experience terrible. Cookie Popup Blocker is a free and open source Chrome extension that removes cookie popups in your browser without agreeing to any of the legal terms.
nodes.title: Cookie Popup Blocker - Get rid of annoying cookie popups
nodes.author: Nasir Shadravan

nodes.excerpt: With dewey. you can grab all of your existing Twitter Bookmarks, search, sort, tag, create and share collections, and yes even export your Twitter Bookmarks to your favorite note-taking app.
nodes.title: dewey. - Get the most out of your Twitter bookmarks
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Finding YouTubers to make videos is a super effective way to promote your product and services. However, getting in touch with them is not so easy. With SocialBook checker, you can email hundreds of YouTubers right from the YouTube search result.
nodes.title: SocialBook Checker - The easiest way to contact YouTube influencers in bulk
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Peanut helps you pick better flights and hotels. See current COVID-19 travel rules and visa requirements while browsing, and even flight delay predictions before you book. Try Peanut on Expedia, Booking or Google Flights today. Add to Chrome, it's free.
nodes.title: Peanut for Chrome - Make travel decisions on Expedia, Booking and Google Flights
nodes.author: Michael Sayman

nodes.excerpt: Carden is a Chrome Extension that helps you turn the content you consume into long-term knowledge. Create flashcards in context, view in-depth stats, collect points and level up, and much more.
nodes.title: Carden - Science-based flashcard app with spaced repetition
nodes.author: Alyssa X

nodes.excerpt: Open your door to the world of Quora marketing with the Q-Stats Quora Marketing Tool. With the newest version of Q-Stats, get SEO data from Google for every question on Quora, and focus on the relevant questions of your target market.
nodes.title: Q-Stats 3.0 - Free marketing & SEO insights for every question on Quora.
nodes.author: Netanel Baruch

nodes.author: GRANTâ˜ï¸

nodes.excerpt: So many ads on YouTube! Find yourself counting down the seconds until 'Skip Ad' appears on screen? https://fuckoff.ytmagically changes 'Skip Ads' to 'F*ck Off' It doesn't block ads but it might make you feel better about them (and creators still get ad revenue)
nodes.title: F*ckOff - Tell YouTube ads to f*ck off

nodes.excerpt: Low contrast text is the most common accessibility issue and affects 86.4% of pages. This free extension based on technology developed for Polypane (https://polypane.app) automatically fixes contrast issues on any site you visit.
nodes.title: Fix contrast - Automatically fix contrast issues on all websites
nodes.author: Kilian Valkhof

nodes.excerpt: The Zoho Sheet web clipper allows you to clip data tables in to spreadsheets in an instant. Using this extension, you can create, access, or spreadsheets in a click. In short, this extension brings Zoho Sheet one step closer to you.
nodes.title: Zoho Sheet Extension & Web Clipper - Clip data and access spreadsheets in an instant

nodes.excerpt: Save those interesting websites, images, videos, tabs and text you find online, then access from anywhere on any device. Share and collaborate with others OR store those sensitive sites in hidden collections that only show with a pin (away from prying eyes)

nodes.title: compairbnb - If you are planning a trip, save yourself some time
nodes.author: Alex Goff

nodes.excerpt: Coherence X4 allows you to turn any website into a chrome-powered app on your Mac, without any compromises. Use extensions, create tabbed and incognito apps, and much more. Coherence X4 even introduces Microsoft Edge and Opera apps!
nodes.title: Coherence X4 - Turn websites into Chrome-powered apps on your Mac
nodes.author: Binyamin Goldman

nodes.excerpt: Get a 10,000-foot view of your professional network. Organize your business contact book the way you want: no ads, no spam, no distractions. Utilize tools such as table-view, tags, notes, filters, personalized messages, and more. Next up: fixing inbox.
nodes.title: LeadDelta - LinkedIn connections manager built for creators
nodes.author: Vedran Rasic

nodes.excerpt: lockrMail is a free productivity tool that acts as a pre-filter for your inbox, providing you with a unique and secure email address to use online. Custom filters enable you to decide which brand emails come to your inbox and which are blocked.
nodes.title: lockrMail - Own the power to organize and protect your email inbox
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Quod AI's Chrome extension helps software developers resolve issues smarter. See instant search suggestions for code and more from your Github or Jira issues. Powered by AI.
nodes.title: Quod AI for Github & Jira issues - 1-click search for code & context from Github/Jira issues
nodes.author: Ravi Sethia

nodes.excerpt: Post uploader for Instagramâ„¢ï¸. Upload photos and videos to Instagram. Support uploading in the next formats - MP4, MOV, JPEG, JPG, PNG, SVG, GIF on Instagram from PC. Upload post with visual image effects or filters, caption and location.

nodes.title: Bernie in Mittens - A new Bernie in Mittens with your new tabs.
nodes.author: Josh Ruby

nodes.excerpt: The Intricately Assistant sits alongside the Google Chrome browser, automatically displaying real-time cloud data on prospects you and your team research. See your prospectsâ€™ cloud footprints, in our most actionable delivery platform yet.
nodes.title: The Intricately Assistant - A new chrome extension to accelerate your sales prospecting
nodes.author: Sarah E. Brown

nodes.excerpt: See an interesting 404 page every time you open a new tab, including the credits and the source code. A great source of inspiration for designers and developers.
nodes.title: 404 New Tab - Discover interesting 404 pages in New Tab
nodes.author: Ryan Chan

nodes.excerpt: With this free Chrome extension, you can watch any Netflix show while we coach you through simple bodyweight exercises in the corner of your screen.
nodes.title: Netflex - Watch Netflix and work out at the same time.
nodes.author: Jenny Nicholson

nodes.excerpt: Once help you limit the time spent on distracting websites, encouraging focus, and mindfulness. Once lets you visit these websites once per hour. The timer starts when you close the tab of one of these websites and only applies it to the homepages.
nodes.title: Once - Stop wasting time on websites that don't make you happy
nodes.author: Youcef Es-skouri

nodes.excerpt: Mornin shows you where you are spending your time so that you can make the most of it. It is a chrome extension that works with Google Calendar.
nodes.title: Mornin - Smart categorization for your calendar events
nodes.author: Mehul Marakana

nodes.excerpt: RecipeCart is a free extension that immediately shows you the recipe in a ready-for-print format. Print, save, or send the recipe to your phone. Under the hood, we use ML to identify exact ingredients + amounts for export to Instacart or Amazon Fresh.
nodes.title: Recipe Cart Chrome Extension - Instantly see recipe or order ingredients on any recipe site
nodes.author: Parker

nodes.excerpt: RHTRH is an open source Chrome extension that raises your (virtual) hand on Google Meet when you raise your (physical) hand. RHTRH works with on any Chromium browsers for all organisations using Google Workspace.
nodes.title: Raise Hand To Raise Hand - Raise your hand in real life to raise your hand on Meet
nodes.author: Lorenzo Signoretti

nodes.excerpt: Mindful video conferencing enhancements for increased productivity and digital wellbeing. Agenda display, guest info, graceful entries/exits, emoji & GIF sharing with an inspiring & fun interface.
nodes.title: Mindfulmeets (for Google Meet) - Add emojis/GIFs, agendas, guest info & more to Google Meet
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subjectâ€“a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
nodes.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email
nodes.author: Argyrou Argyris

nodes.excerpt: Turn your browser bookmarks into embedded cards and watch YouTube/Vimeo videos, listen to audio, see images, read articles and more right from one dashboard. Now offers : â€¢ Nested folders â€¢ Link shortener â€¢ Saving links as PDF â€¢ Highlighting text on web
nodes.title: linkish - Turn boring bookmarks into embedded audio & video cards

nodes.excerpt: Are you lazy? Donâ€™t have time for Linkedin? Meet Linvo. Linvo allows you to grow your network faster to achieve your goals more quickly. Instead of getting five connections every day and five messages. You get 80 connections every day and 80 messages.
nodes.title: Linvo - Get more leads and sales on Linkedin
nodes.author: Nevo David

nodes.title: toast.log 2.0 - Get console errors right on your page (as toasts)

nodes.excerpt: gSweets slash commands save you time, and keep you in a state of flow. Our first batch of shortcuts let you format text, add screenshots, and search emojis, GIFs, and stock photos. Add it to Chrome for free today. Designed to be 100% private.
